data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jodhpur, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Jodhpur.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Sansi Kapadia people. Make the Sansi Kapadia people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Over 97.69 percent of the people of Jodhpur are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Jodhpur, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Jodhpur, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
